scripts.export: next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && touch out/CNAME && echo "laughinggoatghana.com" >> out/CNAME
scripts.deploy: next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && touch out/CNAME && echo "laughinggoatghana.com" >> out/CNAME && push-dir --dir=out --branch=master --cleanup --verbose --remote=laughinggoatghana.github.io
